abstract: Yahoo, which recently appointed a new chief executive, did not fully explain the abrupt departure, but the board has wrestled with several issues in recent months including a possible sale of its Asian assets and the company’s strategic direction.
snippet: Yahoo, which recently appointed a new chief executive, did not fully explain the abrupt departure, but the board has wrestled with several issues in recent months including a possible sale of its Asian assets and the company’s strategic direction.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo announced on Tuesday that Jerry Yang, a co-founder and board member, had stepped down from the board effective immediately. He has also resigned from the boards of Yahoo Japan and the Alibaba Group.

headline.main: Yahoo’s Jerry Yang Resigns From Board
